BACKGROUND - Enum constant in enum class project.chenlin_17.tools.SoundEffect
Default music for background
BackToMenu(MouseEvent) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.GameOverScreenController
This function allows the player to go back to the main menu when he finishes playing and see his scores.
backToScene() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.WorldController
This function allows the user to close the pause menu or the power up menu.
BallModel - Class in project.chenlin_17.Models
This is the class of the ball, which defines the basic attributes of the ball, which includes the radius, ball's bound and the ball's position property.
It also provides methods to access and modify some attributes.
Ball's radius property is not allowed to change once it has been defined.
BallModel(Point2D, int, int) - Constructor for class project.chenlin_17.Models.BallModel
This constructor accepts the basic ball settings and stores the value.
After this constructor, the setting of the ball is done.
ballPositionReset() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.World
This function resets the ball and player to the initial state.
BallView - Class in project.chenlin_17.Views
This is the abstract base class for all ball;s view and relates it to the movements of the ball.
BallView(BallModel, Group) - Constructor for class project.chenlin_17.Views.BallView
This constructor receives the ball model and adds makes its view according to the defined values.
BORDER_COLOR - Variable in class project.chenlin_17.Views.RegularPaddleView
Regular paddle's default color value
BOTHNULL - Variable in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.LogInController
Default warning text when both the name and the password input is null
Brick - Class in project.chenlin_17.Views
This is the abstract base class for all brick classes which defines the common attributes and behaviors of all brick classes.
Brick(Point2D, Dimension2D, int) - Constructor for class project.chenlin_17.Views.Brick
This constructor helps build basic settings for the brick.
Brick(Point2D, Dimension2D, Image, int) - Constructor for class project.chenlin_17.Views.Brick
This constructor helps build general brick view with image.
Brick(Point2D, Dimension2D, Color, Color, int) - Constructor for class project.chenlin_17.Views.Brick
This constructor helps build general brick view with colors.
BRICKCOUNT - Static variable in class project.chenlin_17.Views.GeneralBuilder
whole brickcount is set for defined value 30
BrickFactory - Enum Class in project.chenlin_17.tools
Only defined constructor of the brick building is allowed.
Each constructor has its set value for brick settings.
BrickFactory(String, String, String) - Constructor for enum class project.chenlin_17.tools.BrickFactory
Constructor for image brick settings according to the theme set.
BRICKLINE - Static variable in class project.chenlin_17.Views.GeneralBuilder
brickline is set for defined value 3
BROKEN - Enum constant in enum class project.chenlin_17.tools.SoundEffect
Default music for brick breaking
buildBackground(double, double) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.AdvancedBuilder
This function implements the abstract background builder step in the parent class.
It sets the theme-related background image of the game.
buildBackground(double, double) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.GeneralBuilder
This function implements the abstract background builder step in the parent class.
It sets the default background image of the game.
buildBackground(double, double) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.WorldBuilder
This function is used for building background image.
It needs to be implemented by its children, because different subclass has its own function of building the background image.
buildBall(double, double) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.CharacterOptionsController
This function allows the worldBuilder to build the ball.
buildBall(BallModel, Color) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.AdvancedBuilder
This function implements the abstract ball builder step in the parent class.
It sets the image ball instead of the Ellipse ball face.
The ball's speed is also initialized here.
buildBall(BallModel, Color) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.GeneralBuilder
This function implements the abstract ball builder step in the parent class.
It sets the geometry ball view.
The ball's speed is also initialized here.
buildBall(BallModel, Color) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.WorldBuilder
This function is used for building ball.
It needs to be implemented by its children, because different subclass has its own function of building the ball.
buildGroup() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.WorldBuilder
This function sets the current wall group according to player chosen difficult level
buildInitialScene() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.DirectorApp
This function builds the default world if the player doesn't choose any game settings.
buildLevel(String) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.WorldBuilder
This function is used for converting the palyer readable difficult level to int type.
The converted level could be used for getting the specific level from the wall group in order to make the wall view.
buildPaddle(double, double) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.CharacterOptionsController
This function allows the worldBuilder to build the paddle.
If it is the general world builder, then the paddle is built according to the color the user had chosen.
If it is the advanced world builder, then the paddle is expected to be black.
buildPaddle(PaddleModel, Color, Image, Rectangle) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.AdvancedBuilder
This function implements the abstract paddle builder step in the parent class.
It connects the paddle image to the paddle face and sets it above the paddle face.
buildPaddle(PaddleModel, Color, Image, Rectangle) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.GeneralBuilder
This function implements the abstract paddle builder step in the parent class.
It sets the paddle color according to the player defined color.
buildPaddle(PaddleModel, Color, Image, Rectangle) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.WorldBuilder
This function is used for building paddle.
It needs to be implemented by its children, because different subclass has its own function of building the paddle.
buildSound() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.AdvancedBuilder
This function implements the abstract sound builder step in the parent class.
It builds sound according to theme topic.
buildSound() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.GeneralBuilder
This function implements the abstract sound builder step in the parent class.
It uses the default background sound.
buildSound() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.WorldBuilder
This function is used for building background music.
It needs to be implemented by its children, because different subclass has its own function of building the background music.
buildText(String) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.GameStatusView
This is a helper function to set text's viewing.
buildValue(int) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.GameStatusView
This is a helper function of building the text format
buildWall(double, double, int) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.CharacterOptionsController
This function allows worldBuilder to build the wall group.
buildWall(Rectangle, int) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.WorldBuilder
This function is used for setting the wall according to the player chosen difficult level.
buildWallGroups(Rectangle, int) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.AdvancedBuilder
This function implements the abstract wall builder step in the parent class.
It sets brick walls for all the levels, not just the level the player choose.
buildWallGroups(Rectangle, int) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.GeneralBuilder
This function implements the abstract wall builder step in the parent class.
It sets brick walls for all the levels, not just the level the player choose.
buildWallGroups(Rectangle, int) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.WorldBuilder
This function is used for building wall.
It needs to be implemented by its children, because different subclass has its own function of building the wall.
BUTTONCANCLE - Variable in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.PowerUpController
Defined button style name for button canceling
BUTTONCLICK - Enum constant in enum class project.chenlin_17.tools.SoundEffect
Default music for button clicking
BUTTONCLICK - Variable in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.PowerUpController
Defined button style name for button clicking
